title: Real-Time Streaming-Based Self-Directed Language Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Self-Directed Learning Competency Enhancement Through Real-Time Interaction in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners form self-directed learning habits by voluntarily participating in discussion sessions at least twice weekly via real-time streaming platforms
Learners improve collaborative skills with peers and instructors by at least 80% using real-time streaming platforms for project-based assignments
Learners share weekly learning logs on streaming platforms and satisfy at least 70% of cognitive, affective, and social learning needs
Learners request and incorporate self-assessment feedback at least once monthly using real-time streaming interaction features

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
